Export.Routine:
VARINAUFPCLOSE #include COMSYS #include INConst #include COMConst quit
GoToEncerrar(pYKEY) do GoToForm^COMUtilForm("VARCompraEncerrar", pYKEY) quit
OnBeforeFormConstruction(pYKEY) new objINAUF set objINAUF = $get(^INAUF(YM,pYKEY,1))
set VORG(1) = $$$INAUFSupplierNumber(objINAUF) set VORG(2) = $piece($$GetMotivo(pYKEY),Y,1) set VORG(3) = 1 set VORG(4) = $piece($$GetMotivo(pYKEY),Y,2) set VORG(5) = $piece($$GetMotivo(pYKEY),Y,3) quit
OnAfterSave(pYKEY) if '($get(VORG(3)) = ""){ do Encerrar(pYKEY,$get(VORG(2))) } else { $$$Alert("A ordem de compra nÃ£o foi encerrada.") do GoToForm^COMUtilForm("VARCompra", pYKEY) } quit
OnBeforeButtonLine(pYKEY,&pobjForm) quit:$$$NoKey(pYKEY)
if ($$CheckCompraEncerrada^VARCompra(pYKEY)){ set $$$WWW120AuthorizationToModifyData(pobjForm) = $$$EnumReadOnly } quit
Encerrar(YKEY,pMotivo)
do EncerraOrdem(YKEY,pMotivo)
do GoToForm^COMUtilForm("VARCompraEncerrar", YKEY)
quit
EncerraOrdem(YKEY,pMotivo) new LineItem, objINAUFP, objINAUF, strStatus
quit:(YKEY="")
set LineItem = "" set objINAUFP = "" set objINAUF = "" set strStatus = $$$OK
for { set LineItem = $order(^INAUFP(YM,YKEY,LineItem)) quit:(LineItem="")
set objINAUFP = $get(^INAUFP(YM,YKEY,LineItem,1)) set $$$INAUFPLineItemManualyClosed(objINAUFP) = $$$YES set $$$INAUFPEmployee(objINAUFP) = $get(YBED) set $$$INAUFPManualCloseDate(objINAUFP) = $horolog set $$$INAUFPReasonForClosing(objINAUFP) = pMotivo set $$$INAUFPPosCompleted(objINAUFP) = $$$YES set $$$INAUFPFREE10(objINAUFP) = 3
set strStatus = $$$Save("INAUFP",YKEY_$$$COMMA_LineItem,objINAUFP,$$$YES) }
if ($$$ISOK(strStatus)){ set objINAUF = $get(^INAUF(YM,YKEY,1)) set $$$INAUFFREE14(objINAUF) = 3 ;Status = Completed set strStatus = $$$Save("INAUF",YKEY,objINAUF,$$$YES) }
quit
GetMotivo(pYKEY) quit:(pYKEY="")
new Motivo, EncerradoPor, EncerradoEm set Motivo = "" set EncerradoPor = "" set EncerradoEm = ""
&SQL( SELECT ReasonForClosing,Employee,ManualCloseDate INTO ReasonForClosing,Employee,ManualCloseDate FROM SQLUser.INAUFP WHERE INAUFP.Company = 0 AND ReasonForClosing IS NOT NULL AND Employee IS NOT NULL AND ManualCloseDate IS NOT NULL AND INAUFP.OrderNo = :pYKEY ) if 'SQLCODE { set Motivo = ReasonForClosing set EncerradoPor = Employee set EncerradoEm = ManualCloseDate } quit Motivo_Y_EncerradoPor_Y_EncerradoEm
